data.message:
I don't support Trump, but I would've voted for him over Hillary if I could and I think Trump gets a lot of stick from the media that he doesn't deserve.
Eminem helped me get out of some tough times, and for that I will always respect him. Even if he doesn't want me as a fan.
I wrote something in a language that he can understand,
I doubt he'll ever see it but everyone's got a dream man. Hopefully even if he doesn't y'all can enjoy it.

Divide:

We're now entering a time,
Where people are being,
More vocal about what's on their mind,
The Red and blue side,
How did we get here? Let's Rewind,
So much hate and division,
Because of our opinions,
It's gone from jokes and jest,
To a mothafuckin' mess,

Calling everyone a racist,
God knows they don't deserve it,
Or "liberal idiot"! 
"A Stupid feminist"!
Let's put the insults aside,
And read between the lines,
Good people on either side,
But now not even alive,
Their Souls are dead,
Consumed by the politics,
There once was a time even I was involved in it,
But slowly I grew sick,
Bit by bit,
Of all the mud slinging,
Fists swinging,
Alarm bells in the back of my mind ringing,
Words stinging,
How many death threats,
Has your president received yet?
How can you be so evil so someone your ain't met?
Being a president once got you only respect,
And maybe I just need to get with the times,
But honestly something feels wrong about this in my mind.

We're now entering a time,
Where people are being,
Vocal about what's on their mind,
The Red and blue side,
How did we get here? Let's Rewind,
So much hate and division,
Because of our opinions,
It's gone from jokes and jest,
To a mothafuckin' mess,

How can you turn your back on so many of your fans,
Some been around since 19-96 man,
And I haven't been here for long,
But honestly what saved me,
Was one of your songs,
Now don't get the hump, 
Cos I ain't support Trump,
I'd vote for him over Hillary,
Is that why you're killin' me?
Or is it just for controversy?
I loved "Not Afraid",
And all that funny shit that Shady made,
I will never understand your pain,
But I know you always had the media against your name,
So how could you go along with this?
And get involved in this shit?
Man, I know you've got your reasons,
But is it worth alienating those who loved you till recent?
What if Hailie had a different view?
Would you hate her and disown her as your daughter too?
I see you got a rage,
And you're feeling all the pain,
From all those that Donald's Wronged,
But is it worth killing your fans that you wrote about in your songs?

We're now entering a time,
Where people are being,
Vocal about what's on their mind,
The Red and blue side,
How did we get here? Let's Rewind,
So much hate and division,
Because of our opinions,
It's gone from jokes and jest,
To a mothafuckin' mess,

You're opening the door,
For more civil war,
Each side thinking they know what should be law,
Each side thinking they honestly know a little more,
Now I ain't no villain,
But I'm sick of people thinking I wanna kill em,
Trust me I ain't no artist,
I know that, I'm honestly not retarded,
I just need to vent,
I'm sure hate is not what you meant,
But it came across like you was Hellbent,
On making sure other people were Hell-sent,
Let's stop being divided,
As a community be united,
Skip the politics,
Enjoy the little bits,
Respect others visions,
And let them have their opinions,
Stop the media race-bait,
Stop all the hate,
And Em,
Despite this dispute,
Imma let you know that I'm still rooting for you,
Whether you think it's wrong,
I'm still gon listen to your songs.

replies.message: so very well spoken/rapped my friend - I think you're very talented and wise 🤗
HATE AND DIVISION CAUSED BY TRUMP AND HIS COHORTS. YOU STUPID FUCK

I hope em sees this man
Very well written 
I read it with a em twang 
I agree with it all
Pope your dangerous as a voter, you know so little about whats going on. Maybe youll wake up when they come after your social security!
It's not Red and Blue anymore It's Red Blue and Trump.......get with it .......
Red and blue represents the good and evil people view themselves and each other as.

The hate and division is cause by trump and his cohorts. You stpid fuck. 
  ^^ this is a perfect example of where the hate and division really started. Alex Montagna your a weak minded liberal with the education of a mentally retarded 2nd graded. Fuck you-from eminem. Lmao.  Go choke on a bag of dicks you imbecile. Please take a flying fuck on a rolling doughnut. Now excuse me while i go slap your mom for not swallowing you like a good little cum guzzling gutter slut.

Alex Montagna  NO FUCK YOU, OBAMA, started the division everyone remembers, I was a DEM and a OBAMA supporter......before, he started his lies and division so DONT YOU tell me....I remember why I left that party was his racist division.....IDIOT
Alex Montagna wow nice choice of words from a guy blaming someone else for hate and division...look in the mirror to find the person who hates

I warned people in 2012, but they didn't listen
I saw it all from the outside and neo nazis caused this division
The right now calls for civil war when they don't get their way
Even threatens it just over what others say
I wish we could all just sit in a circle and share a bowl
But one side refuses to even share the same floor
So if they try to keep forcing a civil war
The Alexandrian will give them far more than they bargained for
He gets a lot of shit from the media he doesn't deserve? Which alternate fucking universe do you live in?
Nice words bro. And to all the haters that said "fuck you", Spoken like a true democrats. Uneducated and offended by those who hold different opinions than you. 🤦🏼‍♂️

Peter Lacey 
Trump: "White supremacists should be condemned"
Media: "Trump defends KKK!"

But oh yeah no, the media are 100% fair to Trump....
